timeline.message:
[eclipse/xtext#1679] ported more code to java

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this extend from GeneratorOption or do have a separate class for the primitive returning get?
timeline.author: tivervac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@

+ *******************************************************************************/
+package org.eclipse.xtext.xtext.generator.util;
+
+/**
+ * A Boolean-valued option with default value for use in generator fragments.
+ */
+public class BooleanGeneratorOption {

replies.bodyText: good question. thought about this too but kept it for compatibility reasons
replies.author: cdietrich
